name: G St Food
recommendedItems: Japanese Curry and the Lamb Halal Platter
ambiance: Order at the counter and pickup food in about 5 minutes. Ample seating for groups
description: A fast casual establishment, only 2 blocks from GA. Very good international food, at a reasonable price. Large portions. Can't go wrong here
crowds: Never too crowded. Sometimes a slight line during lunch rush. Can always find seating.
Author: Sambo

name: PotBelly
recommendedItems: Big Turkey and Swiss or Chicken and Cheddar
ambiance: Order at the designated area. Watch them make your sandwich and pay for it when its done.
description: A pretty standard sandwhich shop. Can get almost any sandwich you want. They guarantee you to move through the line in under 8 minutes
crowds: Always through the line quickly. Seating fills up during lunch rush.
Author: Steven Gerrard

name: Au Bon Pain
ambiance: Good variety,  lots of different food options,  relatively fast service and interesting seasonal menu.
description: Great service, tasty food, perfect location.
crowds: Always through the line quickly. Seating fills up during lunch rush.
Author: Fernando Torres

name: Cosi
recommendedItems: Specialty salad with pears and gorgonzola cheese
ambiance: Internet connection was pretty good. Product quality is very good, customer service is very good, and general vibe is very good.
description: They have breakfast, coffee and teas, salads, wraps, paninis and more.
crowds: If you're going for lunch with a big crew be sure to add some time  to the wait as it gets pretty busy for lunch.
Author: Luis Suarez

name: Yafa Grille
ambiance: Variety was good (server was very helpful in recommending my first order), prices very reasonable for quantity and location and, of course, food was fresh, tasty and nutritious
description: Yafa Grill is the Chipotle for Middle Eastern food located off of Franklin Square Park in downtown DC.
crowds: Quick service. Short lines. Outdoor seatings
Author: Mo Salah

name: Corner Bakery Cafe
ambiance: Good options for breakfast, friendly staff and a laid back atmosphere
description: The service was great, all the personal was looking to give you the best attention. Everything I tried on their menu was amazing.
crowds: Quick service. Short lines. Outdoor seatings
Author: Roberto Firminho

name: Lalibela
ambiance: Friendly staff and a laid back atmosphere
description: Got the platter for four to share and it was more than enough food, and we all were incredibly satisfied. A pretty good value too
Author: Sadio Mane
